results.title: Spooky Halloween Sign | Funny Dark Humor Sign | Reaper in Cemetery | Live Laugh Love | Distressed Vintage | Inspirational Sign Gone Wrong
results.description:
Spooky "Live, Laugh, Love" Halloween Sign - Dark Humor - Inspirational Sign Gone Wrong - Funny Take On Traditional Distressed Wall Sign - Reaper in Cemetery Plaque

Show your friends you're not "basic" with this spoof on the classic "Live Laugh Love" sign! This lightweight wall plaque sign (10”x8”x1/4”) is made of cabinet grade hardwood then hand painted and distressed. It has a custom digital design featuring the Grim Reaper silhouetted in a cemetery with spooky trees and bats. It is decoupaged and distressed, then texture is added and it's hand painted to add depth and highlights. (The lettering is exquisite, I literally can't get over how well that turned out!) It's varnished to protect the sign and a black satin ribbon is added to the top as a hanger, which adds about 3" to the overall height.

This sign can add a pop of personal style to your home, entry way, bedroom, bathroom, or any room in your house. It fits a gothic, earthy, witchy, Wiccan, spooky, dark art, eclectic, or Victorian style. These make great gifts as well, perfect for housewarming! Outdoor use is not recommended.

Legal stuff:
-Listing includes the sign only. Any other decor pictured is not included.
-Colors may appear different based on lighting and monitor settings. We do our best to photo items in bright natural light, but please be aware that it may look different in your home.
-Many elements of each item are handmade. Due to this, there may be minor imperfections. Please consider this part of the charm of your original piece of art.
-We are happy to offer custom orders. Please contact us with your requests.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Bracelet, Inspirational Cuff, Mother's Day, Mantra Bracelet, Mantra Bangle, Yoga Jewelry, Charm Bracelet, Rose Gold Bracelet
results.description:
☞ Delivery during the Coronavirus(COVID 19) Pandemic

Due to COVID 19 Pandemic, deliveries are delayed in some countries(Canada, Germany, Russia, the UK & USA) for as much as a month, hence we will not be responsible for any delay in shipment


[The Language of Packaging]

- Each saying meaning written on the kraft packaging is in Korean, so due to this, we cannot accept return.

[Features]

- Made of hypoallergenic, nickel-lead free and rust-resistant surgical stainless steel
- Self-adjustable to fit most wrist sizes
- Durable and comfortable
- (W): 3mm X (T): 2mm X (D): 63mm


[Care and Cleaning]

- Remove your bracelets before going to bed, showering, doing housework or swimming and keep it in a jewelry box
- Avoid direct exposure to some chemical(solvent, hair spray, perfumes and so on) and high temperatures. We suggest that you polish your bracelets with a soft cloth periodically.
- 18 Karat gold plate may tarnish over time but the darkening of the metal is not related to its quality. It is a natural reaction of the metal to the oxygen in the air that can be removed by cleaning your bracelets.

[Shipping & Delivery]

The order will be shipped via "First-Class Package International Service" with "tracking number". It takes approximately 7-25 days to arrive depending on the destination but it may take longer than the official estimated time due to customs clearance or remote area destination

Please note that
- We will not be responsible for the payment of any Import Duty / Tax / VAT under any circumstance.
- We are not responsible for any delays caused by destination customs clearance processes

results.title: Expecting A Little Valentine Shirt, Pregnancy Announcement Shirt, Pregnancy Valentine Shirt, Unisex Tee
results.description:
Thanks for being here!!! We are glad to serve you. Please contact us 24/7, we are always available! With your purchase you are helping us!. We are a small family business that believes in EQUALITY, FREEDOM and LOVE for everyone.

How to order:

1.- Please, check our available sizes, colors and measurements.

2.- Choose your design.

3.- Enter your shirt Color (Primary color)

For Example; White

4.- Enter your Size (They fit pretty true to size!)

5.- Use our personalization box to write the details, for example additional words for your design, different colors.

6.- Click add to cart. You can go back to add more products!!

7.-Click "Proceed to check out"

8.- When you check out, you can add a note to seller for any request


Care Instructions

Wash item inside out in cold water, do not bleach, do not dry clean, do not iron directly on the design.

Production and Shipping

If you buy your shirt before 1:00 pm we make it and ship the same day!!

results.title: To My Son Love From Mom Vintage Signs -  Gifts For Son Blanket - I Love You To The Moon and Back Blanket
results.description:
---QUILT---
Each quilt features a premium polyester print for beautiful color vibrancy, even after washing.
Constructed from an ultra-soft polyester fabric with a hypo-allergenic cotton filling.
The diamond stitched pattern gives a luxurious feel that is cozy and breathable, perfect for all year round use.
These quilts are great for a picnic at the park, snuggling while watching TV, relaxing on the sofa, or as a stylish bedspread.
Machine washable with cold water gentle cycle and mild detergent.

---BLANKET--
Each blanket features a premium suede polyester print for beautiful color vibrancy.
Cozy underside is constructed from an ultra-soft micro fleece fabric to keep you warm and comfortable.
Perfect for snuggling while watching TV on the couch, relaxing on a sofa, or reading in bed.
Machine washable with cold water gentle cycle and mild detergent.

--SHIPPING US--
Processing Time: 3-5 business days

results.title: Live Love Laugh Seashell Sign Handcrafted Wood Rustic Wedding Colorful Shells engagement bridal gift decoration beach sign bathroom decor
results.description:
Handcrafted 'Live Love Laugh' sign made with real seashells mounted on a dark brown wooden board with white brushed paint accents.   Protected with a premium enamel gloss.

The sign is 8 inches in length and 8 inches in height.

It is ready to hang on the wall using the Jute rope or could also just sit upon a shelf by itself.

This makes a beautiful bridal gift, wedding decoration, engagement gift, or even for Valentine's Day! The sign is also great for decorating a beach cottage or any coastal themed room.

Message me to request a different design or even an Initial if not already available in the shop :)

Shipping includes USPS Priority Mail 2-3 day shipping services.

results.description:

+ frames do not come with prints. Canvas is ready to hang.
+ Proofs (if required) will be sent via Etsy Convos. See shipping details for turn around time.

PRINTS:

Prints are professionally printed on high quality, archival ultra-pro satin photo paper with pigmented inks. Prints are brilliant, crisp and beautiful! And will last a lifetime and beyond. Prints will need framing.

Poster prints (12x18 and larger) are mounted on light weight, 3/16" foam board for sturdiness and can be hung as is or framed. These take about 7 days to ship out after proofs are approved and are only ** available to ship in the USA & Canada at this time.

CANVAS:
Gallery wrapped canvas are ready to hang and are available in a variety of sizes. Canvas is museum quality using UV resistant archival inks and will last lifetime. Canvas is stretched on a 1.5 inch thick wooden frame and is ready to hang with a saw-tooth hook on the back. 

Some available sizes (varies per listing ) 5x7, 8x10, 11x14 or 16x20 inch.

Your artwork is carefully packaged, insured and shipped to your  address in your Etsy account.

 
*** If you are outside the USA or Canada and want to order prints only, contact me.

Thank you ♥

Christine

results.title: All You Need is Love and Gin Quote, Vinyl Wall Art Sticker Decal Mural, Bedroom, Lounge. Home, Wall Decor
results.description:
All You Need is Love and Gin Quote - Matt Vinyl Wall Art Sticker Decal Mural.

16 colours to choose from, see picture on this listing.

This Vinyl Wall Art Sticker Decal measures total dimensions. 4 x sizes available:

40cm wide x 20.2cm high, 60cm wide x 30.3cm high, 80cm wide by 40.5cm high & 100cm wide x 50.6cm high. 

We strongly suggest measuring out the dimensions on your wall space prior to ordering so as to properly gauge the finished size of the sticker

16 COLOURS TO CHOOSE FROM – See the pictures for colour options
_________________________________

WHY OUR WALL ART DECALS ARE SO SPECIAL:

1) Each decal is made of high quality, self-adhesive waterproof vinyl. 

2) Each of our products is quality checked before being sent to you and contains its very own authentic quality mark, the Fabulous Stickers quality seal of approval.

3) All orders come with a FREE GIFT!

4) Your wall art sticker comes complete with a FREE test sticker so you can try before you apply your chosen design.

5) Full written and pictorial instructions are included.

WHAT SURFACES ARE SUITABLE FOR VINYL WALL ART STICKER DECALS?

Decals can be applied to any clean, smooth and flat surface. Put them on your walls painted walls (matt, vinyl and gloss), doors, wardrobes, windows, mirrors, cars and metal surfaces - anywhere you want! 

WHY DECALS?

They are much faster, cleaner and easier than painting, the cost effective way to re-decorate a room or hallway in a few short minutes!

Why not use various decals and colors to create a unique design! 

SHIPPING:

Orders ship within 48 hours of receipt of payment. 

Allow 3-5 business days for delivery via 1st Class Royal Mail for domestic orders in the UK

We ship worldwide from the UK

PAYMENT:

Please remit payment within 3 days of ordering. 

We accept PayPal, Pay Pal also accepts all major credit cards. 

APPLICATION INSTRUCTIONS:

Our vinyl wall art decals are easy and fun to install. 
Complete and simple step-by-step instructions are included with your order.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:

We can custom size most designs to your specifications. 
Please contact us for an estimate. 

We can also create custom word art (for example - favourite phrases, names, Bible verses, etc.) Message us for more information.

We have a 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE. If, for any reason, you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, you can return any unused vinyl wall art sticker decals to us within 7 days of purchase for a full refund of the purchase price (less shipping). 

Enjoy your new vinyl wall decals.  Thank you for choosing Fabulous Stickers!

results.title: Burlap Table Runner  with Live Laugh Love - Holiday decorating Wedding runner Home decor
results.description:
Holiday Note - Dear friends,
Due to the unprecedented volume of orders that we are receiving we are currently working day & night to complete all orders that came in after 11/29. We are still accepting all orders but wanted to let you know that we are currently shipping about 15-20 business days from order date.  We are shipping ALL orders USPS Priority Mail, but please understand that the Postal system is also behind in delivering orders.

We are very thankful for our customers in these trying times and wish you all the best in the New Year.

Burlap table runner with Live Laugh Love painted down the middle of the runner. Ends are hemmed.  Sides are serged for a beautiful finished edge.   Note : Serging will reduce the width by approximately 1/4".  Beautiful table runner for a wedding, Holiday or everyday table. 

I can also do Friends Faith Family Hope Peace Joy or Believe combinations, just list in the notes section at checkout if you want a saying other than Live Laugh Love.

To achieve same look as in my photo, please add 24" to your table length, then order that size. My photo shows approx 12" overhang on each end.

If you don't see your size, send me a message. 

Burlap has natural imperfections which add to its rustic charm. Spot clean only - NOT recommended for washing machine.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Vertical Porch Sign Reversible Wood Sign Distressed Wood Large Sign Patio Decor Rustic Primitive Decor Inspirational Quote
results.description:
Handcrafted wood creating this  Large Entryway Sign "Live Well Laugh Often Love Much". Sign measures 26"x 7 1/4" x 3/4". 

The sign is available to be made into a reversible sign as a choice, check out our new Halloween "Spooky" design or Sweet Summer Time, or Welcome Spring. If you would prefer to have it one sided and hang on a wall we can also add a D Hook at no additional charge.  

The piece has been cut to size, sanded, painted,  stenciled with acrylic paint. It has been coated with a clear polycrylic to help preserve it from the elements and help your sign last for years to come.

If you would like this done in different colors just let us know upon ordering. This sign was done with black under red & lettering in white & black.

results.title: Keychain / Live / Love / Laugh / custom / gifts / motivation / affirmation / motivation / worth
results.description:
Fun key chain with motivation quote.  Live Love Laugh.


I’ve always loved creating and finding new ways to funnel my artistic passion, this is how Crown Jules was formed.  I love cross stitching and embroidery, but there are only so many wall hangings I can make.  I started making small necklaces and badges for friends and family until I finally plucked up the courage to start my own store and share my creations with the world.  As I am growing and expanding, so are the product being offered in my shop.  So come back often  to see what new items we have in store.


NOTES
*Please note that my products are not waterproof and should be removed before swimming or showering.
*All of my pieces are handmade by me in my home studio.  I take a lot of care in each piece I craft.
*Because each item is handmade, there may be slight differences from the pictures viewed.
*If you are interested in a Custom Order either with a hand stitched design or a printed map, picture or logo, please reach out to me first before placing an order to ensure complete satisfaction on both sides.
